long_description: With the Seattle Sports PVC-Free Sun Shower, all it takes to enjoy a warm shower right at your campsite is water, sunshine and a little patience. PVC-free material is heavy duty yet lightweight for easy packing; black color absorbs heat to warm water in just a few hours. 2.5-, 4- and 5-gallon bags accommodate the water needs of solo backpackers or a small group of campers. Teardrop shape concentrates the water flow to the shower nozzle. Push/pull valve on hose is easy to use, allowing you to turn water off quickly. Sturdy plastic handle on the Seattle Sports PVC-Free Sun Shower offers convenient toting and durability; hanging strap is adjustable.
short_description: With the Seattle Sports PVC-Free Sun Shower, all it takes to enjoy a warm shower right at your campsite is water, sunshine and a little patience.
